channel.title: Hybridscape Node System
channel.description:
What is a node: [b]A controller for different aspects of the hybridscape server. it may or may not effect the game server directly[/b]
[b]Node types[/b]
[ol][li]Server Node[/li][/ol] - Accepts incoming connections example would be the gameserver or a loginserver, friend server
[ul][li]Connection Node - Connects to a server and maintains the connection example: (World 1 hosts the gameserver and the login server, World2 Hosts a gameserver but uses a connection node to world 1's login server)[/li] [li]Bypass Node - For when the server host is lazy or has no need for a server or connection node (most moparscapers)[/li] [li]Other Node - I put this one here for undefined purposes it may be scrapped[/li][/ul]
The Game Server is a required Node to be running in the node manager and the Game Server will also require 3 other nodes (bypass will be the most common) to be functioning
What Nodes the Game Server Requires:
[ol][li]Login Node[/li] [li]Friends Node[/li][/ol]
Well that's as far as I've gotten on this for the time being.

item.title: Hybridscape Node System
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

What is a node: A controller for different aspects of the hybridscape server. it may or may not effect the game server directly

Node types

[ol][li]Server Node[/li][/ol]

  • Accepts incoming connections example would be the gameserver or a loginserver, friend server

[ul][li]Connection Node - Connects to a server and maintains the connection example: (World 1 hosts the gameserver and the login server, World2 Hosts a gameserver but uses a connection node to world 1’s login server)[/li]
[li]Bypass Node - For when the server host is lazy or has no need for a server or connection node (most moparscapers)[/li]
[li]Other Node - I put this one here for undefined purposes it may be scrapped[/li][/ul]

The Game Server is a required Node to be running in the node manager and the Game Server will also require 3 other nodes (bypass will be the most common) to be functioning

What Nodes the Game Server Requires:

[ol][li]Login Node[/li]
[li]Friends Node[/li][/ol]

Well that’s as far as I’ve gotten on this for the time being.
